sentence.Network_en: The company is certain to reinvest its profits productively.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司肯定会将它的利润进行高效益的再投资。

sentence.Network_en: Executives say they are hesitant to reinvest such profits into their businesses.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司高管表示,他们对是否要将盈利再投资到业务中感到犹豫不决.

sentence.Network_en: A similar male borrower , she says, will reinvest only 60 cents.
sentence.Network_cn: 相同的,一个男性借款人只会投资一美元中的60美分.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... reinvent 重复设置 reinvest 再投资于 reinvestigate 再调查.
沪江博客 - ＿＾幸福众享◇ ... dividend  n. 被除数,股利 reinvest  vt. 再投资于,再授给.
reinvest 归还, reinvest 重新赋于, reinvest 重新投资于
reinversion 再倒位, reinvest 再围攻, reinversion 复位术

list.abs: 再投资率-再投资率(Reinvestment Rate) 什么是再投资率再投资率又称内部成长性比率,是指企业每年赚取的钱(是指现金流量,而不是会计盈余),有百分之几用于投资.
regular income 固定收入reinvested income 再投资收入relative income 相对收入
reinvestment再投资reinvestment privilege再投资特权reinvestment rate再投资率
石油英语词汇(P7)--石油百科 ... profit ratio 利润比率 profit reinvested 利润再投资 profit sharing oil 利润分成油.

auth_sentence.content: I suggest that they reinvest it and let it grow.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I suggest that they reinvest it and let it grow.

auth_sentence.content: That means investors generally can reinvest their dividends at fair prices.
auth_sentence.res_content: That means investors generally can reinvest their dividends at fair prices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That means investors generally can reinvest their dividends at fair prices.

auth_sentence.content: Norway also set up a sovereign fund to reinvest and save for the post-oil future.
auth_sentence.res_content: Norway also set up a sovereign fund to reinvest and save for the post-oil future.
